basic.description:
A detailed study of French writers after 1848. Travaux pratiques include tests, an oral presentation and an in-depth essay. Given jointly with FREN 323/3.0.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (33L;3Pc;84P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: La littérature française de 1848 à 1900

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    FREN212 and FREN220 and Level 4 and registration in a FREN or FRLG plan.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN323; FREN423.
